summary: Hanuman is a beloved Hindu deity, known for his devotion to Rama. He is a divine monkey (vanara) with incredible strengths, believed to be the son of the wind god, Vayu. His stories are mainly told in the Ramayana, but he also appears in other ancient texts. Hanuman's popularity grew during the second millennium CE, becoming a symbol of strength and devotion. He is revered for his loyalty, self-control, and commitment, inspiring many, even in modern times. Some even compare him to Sun Wukong, a character from Chinese mythology.
title: Hanuman
